name: Units.chartAt_apply
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NormedRing R
inst✝ : CompleteSpace R
a b : Units R
⊢ Eq (↑(chartAt R a) b) ↑b
decl:
theorem chartAt_apply {a : Rˣ} {b : Rˣ} : chartAt R a b = b :=
  rfl

name: Units.chartAt_source
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : NormedRing R
inst✝ : CompleteSpace R
a : Units R
⊢ Eq (chartAt R a).source Set.univ
decl:
theorem chartAt_source {a : Rˣ} : (chartAt R a).source = Set.univ :=
  rfl

name: Units.instIsManifoldModelWithCornersSelf
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : NormedRing R
inst✝² : CompleteSpace R
n : WithTop ENat
𝕜 : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
inst✝ : NormedAlgebra 𝕜 R
⊢ IsManifold (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 R) n (Units R)
decl:
instance : IsManifold 𝓘(𝕜, R) n Rˣ :=
  isOpenEmbedding_val.isManifold_singleton

name: Units.contMDiff_val
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : NormedRing R
inst✝² : CompleteSpace R
n : WithTop ENat
𝕜 : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
inst✝ : NormedAlgebra 𝕜 R
⊢ ContMDiff (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 R) (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 R) n Units.val
decl:
/-- For a complete normed ring `R`, the embedding of the units `Rˣ` into `R` is a `C^n` map between
manifolds. -/
lemma contMDiff_val : ContMDiff 𝓘(𝕜, R) 𝓘(𝕜, R) n (val : Rˣ → R) :=
  contMDiff_isOpenEmbedding Units.isOpenEmbedding_val

name: Units.instLieGroupModelWithCornersSelf
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝³ : NormedRing R
inst✝² : CompleteSpace R
n : WithTop ENat
𝕜 : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
inst✝ : NormedAlgebra 𝕜 R
⊢ LieGroup (modelWithCornersSelf 𝕜 R) n (Units R)
decl:
/-- The units of a complete normed ring form a Lie group. -/
instance : LieGroup 𝓘(𝕜, R) n Rˣ where
  contMDiff_mul := by
    apply ContMDiff.of_comp_isOpenEmbedding Units.isOpenEmbedding_val
    have : (val : Rˣ → R) ∘ (fun x : Rˣ × Rˣ => x.1 * x.2) =
      (fun x : R × R => x.1 * x.2) ∘ (fun x : Rˣ × Rˣ => (x.1, x.2)) := by ext; simp
    rw [this]
    have : ContMDiff (𝓘(𝕜, R).prod 𝓘(𝕜, R)) 𝓘(𝕜, R × R) n
      (fun x : Rˣ × Rˣ => ((x.1 : R), (x.2 : R))) :=
      (contMDiff_val.comp contMDiff_fst).prod_mk_space (contMDiff_val.comp contMDiff_snd)
    refine ContMDiff.comp ?_ this
    rw [contMDiff_iff_contDiff]
    exact contDiff_mul
  contMDiff_inv := by
    apply ContMDiff.of_comp_isOpenEmbedding Units.isOpenEmbedding_val
    have : (val : Rˣ → R) ∘ (fun x : Rˣ => x⁻¹) = Ring.inverse ∘ val := by ext; simp
    rw [this, ContMDiff]
    refine fun x => ContMDiffAt.comp x ?_ (contMDiff_val x)
    rw [contMDiffAt_iff_contDiffAt]
    exact contDiffAt_ring_inverse _ _
